text:
The elusive cheesecake that's fully booked six months
ahead! It's Mano-chan's grand prize~!

I just looked it up a bit ago
but all the reviews for that cake were like "delicious".

I'm not really familiar with these kinds of shops,
so I'm glad they'll tell us about it on the show...

Oh yeah, I get that.
I wonder how everyone else finds out about these places?

Those who know trendy spots, but also those who know
places that are delicious before they become trendy.

...Meguru-chan often talks with staff members
and co-stars about stuff like that.

I'm also told about delicious restaurants
and snacks that people are interested in...

Hiori-chan also knows a lot about delicious treats
that she brings in...
...I'm always learning from both of them.

Haha, but today, thanks to you,
I can introduce the cheesecake.

...Earlier, I sent a message to
Hiori-chan and Meguru-chan.

Before tomorrow's lesson, 
e'll have tea at the office and eat it...

...But, the fact that the conversation is already settled
shows the teamwork we have.

Hehe... both Hiori-chan and Meguru-chan
replied quickly...
Yes, it's the kind of coordination you'd expect from Illumine...

...Right, I'd like to hear your thoughts on the taste
since you don't often encounter a cake with a six-month wait.
Producer-san, are you not going to have any...?

Huh?
But the three of us are having tea together...

Oh, um... I thought
Producer-san would be at the office...

If it's okay...
we were planning on having tea together, so...
If you're not busy with work or anything...

...Thank you.
In that case, I'll take you up on that offer and join you.
